verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty, mighty Saviour
Mighty, mighty Lord
Mighty, mighty Saviour
You are my God (you are my God)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Father, Father, Father my Lord (2X)
Let your praises ring
Let your people sing
That you are a...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus Jesus my Lord (2X)
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit of God (2X)
